Deliverable.description: WBS's deliverable linked to the invoice term

ExecutionFromDate.description: Execution date: From of invoice term

ExecutionToDate.description: Execution date: To of invoice term

InvoiceStatus.description: The invoice status of the invoice term. E.g: 10 = Draft, 20 = Open, 30 = Processing..., 50 = Processed

Item.description: Item that linked to the invoice term

Modified.description: Last modified date of invoice term

Modifier.description: ID of user that modified the record

ModifierFullName.description: Full name of user that modified the record

Notes.description: Notes linked to the invoice term for providing additional information

Percentage.description: Percentage of amount per project`s budeged amount

Project.description: ID of project that linked to the invoice term

ProjectDescription.description: Project description that linked to the invoice term

VATCode.description: VAT code that used in the invoice term

VATCodeDescription.description: Description of VAT code that used in the invoce term

VATPercentage.description: Persentage of VAT code that used in the invoice term

WBS.description: ID of WBS that linked to the invoice term
